title: Only One Forever
description: From The Something So Series and the This Is series comes Only One Forever.DylanMy dreams came true when I was adopted at ten.I was the best on the ice. Living the life of what every kid dreams of.We’ve been best friends since then. Even when she was the annoying little sister following us around.I would do anything for her.It is another family vacation; except this time it feels different. Everything feels different.AlexAll my memories have Dylan in them. From the first time I fell off my bike, to the time I got my heartbroken for the first time.He’s always been my protector, but it’s time to let the dream of being his go.One last family trip, one last goodbye.Except fate steps in and has other plans.At the end of the day, you only get one forever.
author: Natasha Madison
